ad_text: Adams Builders Supply Sponsored Looking to hire a yard worker/delivery driver. Must have a clean driving record, be able to lift 75 pounds, and drive truck and trailer. Duties would include but not limited to, using forklift, unloading/loading trucks and customers, making deliveries, cleaning yard, stocking materials, maintaining an organized yard. Would prefer someone with a Class B CDL minimum that could drive and make deliveries with our boom truck in the spring/summer. Please stop at the store and pick up an application in person if interested in the job no online applications will be accepted. FULL-TIME · ADAMS, MINNESOTA Yard Worker Apply now
